name: parse
title: Parse - Speed Reader
description: Speed read copied text one word at a time.
author: traf

commands.name: index
commands.title: Parse Text
commands.description: Speed read copied text one word at a time.

preferences.name: wpm
preferences.title: Words Per Minute
preferences.description: Reading speed in words per minute

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
